goal.title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

indicators.title: Proportion of population living in households with access to basic services

Proportion of population covered by social protection floors/systems, by sex, distinguishing children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims and the poor and the vulnerable
Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
Proportion of population living below the national poverty line, by sex and age

goal.title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

indicators.title: The agriculture orientation index for government expenditures
Proportion of local breeds classified as being at risk, not at risk or at unknown level of risk of extinction
Number of plant and animal genetic resources for food and agriculture secured in either medium- or long-term conservation facilities
Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture
Volume of production per labour unit by classes of farming/pastoral/forestry enterprise size
Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age

goal.title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

indicators.title: Health worker density and distribution
Prevalence of tobacco use among youth aged 13-15
Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
Proportion of population with large household expenditures on health as a share of total household expenditure or income

Coverage of essential health services (defined as the average coverage of essential services based on tracer interventions that include reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health, infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases and service capacity and access, among the general and the most disadvantaged population)
Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
Prevalence of alcohol use among among population above 18 years old
Death rate due to road traffic injuries
Harmful use of alcohol, defined according to the national context as alcohol per capita consumption (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year in litres of pure alcohol
Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
Malaria incidence
Suicide mortality rate
Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
Tuberculosis incidence per 100,000 population
Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
Neonatal mortality rate
Under‐5 mortality rate
Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel
Maternal mortality ratio

goal.title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

indicators.title: Percentage of teachers who received in-service training
Percentage of secondary teachers qualified according to national standards
Percentage of primary teachers qualified according to national standards
Percentage of pre school teachers qualified according to national standards

Proportion of teachers in: (a) pre-primary; (b) primary; (c) lower secondary; and (d) upper secondary education who have received at least the minimum organized teacher training (e.g. pedagogical training) pre-service or in-service required for teaching at the relevant level in a given country
Proportion of schools with access to adapted infrastructure and materials for students with disabilities
Proportion of schools with access to single-sex basic sanitation facilities

Proportion of schools with access to (a) electricity; (b) the Internet for pedagogical purposes; (c) computers for pedagogical purposes; (d) adapted infrastructure and materials for students with disabilities; (e) basic drinking water; (f) single-sex basic sanitation facilities; and (g) basic handwashing facilities (as per the WASH indicator definitions)
Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex
Gender parity index in upper secondary education

Parity indices (female/male, rural/urban, bottom/top wealth quintile and others such as disability status, indigenous peoples and conflict-affected, as data become available) for all education indicators on this list that can be disaggregated
Gross enrolment rate in technical-vocational education programmes (15- to 24-year-olds)
Participation rate of youth and adults in formal and non-formal education and training in the previous 12 months, by sex
Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex
Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex
Completion rate Grade 9
Completion rate Grade 6

goal.title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

indicators.title: Number of line Ministries, Line Agencies have development and Implement Gender Mainstreaming Strategic  Plan
Number of countries with laws and regulations that guarantee full and equal access to women and men aged 15 years and older to sexual and reproductive health care, information and education
Proportion of women aged 15–49 years who make their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use and reproductive health care
Proportion of seats held by women in commune councils
5.5.2 Proportion of under secretary of state who are women
5.5.2 Proportion of secretary of state who are women
Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, by sex, age and location
Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence

Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‐discrimination on the basis of sex

goal.title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

indicators.title: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
Change in water-use efficiency over time
Proportion of wastewater safely treated
Proportion of population using (a) safely managed sanitation services and (b) a hand-washing facility with soap and water
Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services

goal.title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

indicators.title: Energy intensity measured in terms of primary energy and GDP
Renewable energy share in the total final energy consumption
Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
Proportion of population with access to electricity

goal.title: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

indicators.title: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
Proportion of jobs in sustainable tourism industries out of total tourism jobs
Tourism direct GDP as a proportion of total GDP and in growth rate
All kinds of products both goods and services that have been processed or developed and have been included in OVOP Movement
Growth Rate of online issuing the Cerficate of Origin
Growth rate of online trade mark registration
Growth rate of online company registration
Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita

goal.title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

indicators.title: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP
Manufacturing value added as a proportion of GDP and per capita
9.1.3 Air transport, international freight
9.1.3 Air transport, domestic freight
9.1.2 Air transport, international passengers carried
9.1.2 Air transport, domestic passengers carried

goal.title: Reduce inequality within and among countries

indicators.title: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
Proportion of tariff lines applied to imports from least developed countries and developing countries with zero-tariff
Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers
Proportion of people living below 50 per cent of median income, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
Growth rates of household expenditure or income per capita among the bottom 40 per cent of the population and the total population

goal.title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

indicators.title: Annual average of the parameters of CO, NO2, SO2, TSP, PM2.5 and PM10
Percentage of the solid wasted will be segregate by technical guidance
Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter (e.g. PM2.5 and PM10) in cities (population weighted)
Proportion of urban solid waste regularly collected and with adequate final discharge out of total urban solid waste generated, by cities

goal.title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

indicators.title: National recycling rate, tons of material recycled
Effectiveness management of hazardous waste and biological and radioactive waste
Hazardous waste generated per capita and proportion of hazardous waste treated, by type of treatment

Number of parties to international multilateral environmental agreements on hazardous waste, and other chemicals that meet their commitments and obligations in transmitting information as required by each relevant agreement

goal.title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

indicators.title: Number of countries that have communicated the strengthening of institutional, systemic and individual capacity-building to implement adaptation, mitigation and technology transfer, and development actions
Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population

goal.title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

indicators.title: Progress by countries in the degree of application of a legal/regulatory/policy/institutional framework which recognizes and protects access rights for small-scale fisheries
Sustainable fisheries as a proportion of GDP in small island developing States, least developed countries and all countries
Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas
Percentage of degraded freshwater flooded forests and mangrove forests (ha) that has been transplanted and protected
Proportion of national exclusive economic zones managed using ecosystem-based approaches
Index of coastal eutrophication and floating plastic debris density

goal.title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

indicators.title: Official development assistance and public expenditure on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems
Number of policies, strategies and regulations on ecosystem services is established and implemented
Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
Red List Index
Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area
Progress towards sustainable forest management
Forest areas and ecosystems sustainably utilized
Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
Forest area as a proportion of total land area

goal.title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

indicators.title: Proportions of positions (by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local legislatures, public service, and judiciary) compared to national distributions
Proportion of victims of violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms

goal.title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

indicators.title: Amount of ODA to Economic and Development Policy/Planning (as % of GDP)​​​ committed to Cambodia
Dollar value of financial and technical assistance (including through North-South, South‐South and triangular cooperation) committed to developing countries
Proportion of individuals using the Internet
Number of science and/or technology cooperation agreements and programmes between countries, by type of cooperation
Foreign direct investment (FDI), official development assistance and South-South cooperation as a proportion of total domestic budget
Number of countries that have national statistical legislation that complies with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
Amount of United States dollars committed to (a) public-private partnerships and (b) civil society partnerships
Worldwide weighted tariff-average
The number of mine and ERW casualties received emergency  and rapid response from CMAA
The number of mine and ERW casualties received rehabilitation service
The number of mine and ERW casualties received rights promotion
The number of villages contaminated by mines / ERW to receive Mine Risk Educationmessages
Number of civilian casualties from mines/ERW
Total cumulated areas cleared of mines/ERW
